text: Skate (stylized "skate.") is a video game series devolped by Electronic Arts. There are 4 games in the series, Skate, Skate It!, Skate 2, and Skate 3. There is one upcoming game, named skate. == Games == === Skate (2007) === Main Article: Skate (2007 video game) === Skate 2 (2009) === Main Article: Skate 2 === Skate 3 (2010) === Main Article: Skate 3
title: Skate (video game series)
